item.description:
Marketing Your Business In 2010 - How To Make Social Media An Investment of Time, Rather Than A Waste of Time

You've seen or at least heard about the online social networking tools. Do you know how to integrate LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter and the others into what you are doing to propel business? Are you currently viewing these tools as a waste of time, or as an investment of time? In this presentation, you will learn how to create an online strategy that will go hand in hand with your current marketing plans. By using these tools, you can create a financially inexpensive online image that will create priceless visibility and credibility in your field. In 2010, will you embrace the change and go where your customers are, or continue with the old way business was being done?

Angela Lussier is an award winning speaker, author of "The Anti-Resume Revolution", and owner of 365 Degrees Consulting in Springfield, Massachusetts. Angelaâ€™s clients are job seekers and entrepreneurs who are looking for creative ideas and inspiration for personal branding, marketing & PR campaigns, and figuring out their career strategy. Ms. Lussier is one of the American Heart Association's "Leading Ladies of Western Mass" for 2010.
item.name: January Breakfast Meeting- Marketing Your Business In 2010
